item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, April 25, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Writing "/etc/hosts" breaks the Substack editor (265 points | 140 comments)
2. Eurorack Knob Idea (132 points | 46 comments)
3. Tumor-derived erythropoietin acts as immunosuppressive switch in cancer immunity (35 points | discuss)

5. Huge reproducibility project fails to validate biomedical studies (25 points | 4 comments)
6. Foundry (YC F24) Is Hiring – Come Build a World Model for the Web ( | hide)

23. Write an Interpreter in Ruby (4 points | discuss)
24. OpenVSX, which VSCode forks rely on for extensions, down for 24 hours (232 points | 131 comments)
25. Ask HN: Share your AI prompt that stumps every model (357 points | 584 comments)
26. A Visual Journey Through Async Rust (113 points | 18 comments)
27. New analysis casts doubt on 'biosignatures' found on planet K2-18B (10 points | discuss)
28. GCC, the GNU Compiler Collection 15.1 released (124 points | 95 comments)
29. Show HN: Logiquiz – Daily Self-Referential Puzzles (24 points | 12 comments)
